name: Kingdra
description: The Dragon Pokémon. Kingdra lives at extreme ocean depths that are otherwise uninhabited. It has long been believed that the yawning of this Pokémon creates spiraling ocean currents.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: This Pokémon's speed is doubled in rainy conditions.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: On a critical hit made by this Pokémon, triple the dice roll instead of doubling it.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: This Pokémon is unaffected by Self Destruct and Explosion moves.
